verses.verse: <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> you <S%H7350>afar<s%> off, O <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> why <S%H5956>hide<s%> you yourself in <S%H6256>times<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble?<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> in his <S%H1346>pride<s%> does <S%H1814>persecute<s%> the <S%H6041>poor:<s%> let them be <S%H8610>taken<s%> in the <S%H4209>devices<s%> that they have <S%H2803>imagined.<s%>
For the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1984>boasts<s%> of his <S%H5315>heart's<s%> <S%H8378>desire,<s%> and <S%H1288>blesses<s%> the <S%H1214>covetous,<s%> whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5006>abhors.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> through the <S%H1363>pride<s%> of his <S%H639>countenance,<s%> will not <S%H1875>seek<s%> after <S%H430>God<s%>: God is not in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4209>thoughts.<s%>

His <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H3605>always<s%> <S%H6256><s%> <S%H2342>grievous;<s%> your <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are <S%H5048>far<s%> <S%H4791>above<s%> out of his <S%H5048>sight:<s%> as for <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6887>enemies,<s%> he <S%H6315>puffs<s%> at them.
He has <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> I shall not be <S%H4131>moved:<s%> for I shall <S%H1755>never<s%> be in <S%H7451>adversity.<s%>

His <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H423>cursing<s%> and <S%H4820>deceit<s%> and <S%H8496>fraud:<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is <S%H5999>mischief<s%> and <S%H205>vanity.<s%>

He <S%H3427>sits<s%> in the <S%H3993>lurking<s%> places of the <S%H2691>villages:<s%> in the <S%H4565>secret<s%> places does he <S%H2026>murder<s%> the <S%H5355>innocent:<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H6845>privately<s%> <S%H6845>set<s%> against the <S%H2489>poor.<s%>

He lies in <S%H693>wait<s%> <S%H4565>secretly<s%> as a <S%H738>lion<s%> in his <S%H5520>den:<s%> he lies in <S%H693>wait<s%> to <S%H2414>catch<s%> the <S%H6041>poor:<s%> he does <S%H2414>catch<s%> the <S%H6041>poor,<s%> when he <S%H4900>draws<s%> him into his <S%H7568>net.<s%>
He <S%H1794>crouches,<s%> and <S%H7817>humbles<s%> himself, that the <S%H2489>poor<s%> may <S%H5307>fall<s%> by his <S%H6099>strong<s%> ones.

He has <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> has <S%H7911>forgotten:<s%> he <S%H5641>hides<s%> his <S%H6440>face;<s%> he will <S%H1074>never<s%> <S%H5331><s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> it.
<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> O <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H5375>lift<s%> up your <S%H3027>hand:<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> not the <S%H6041>humble.<s%>
<S%H5921>Why<s%> <S%H4100><s%> does the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5006>scorn<s%> <S%H430>God?<s%> he has <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> You will not <S%H1875>require<s%> it.

You have <S%H7200>seen<s%> it; for you <S%H5027>behold<s%> <S%H5999>mischief<s%> and <S%H3708>spite,<s%> to <S%H5414>requite<s%> it with your <S%H3027>hand:<s%> the <S%H2489>poor<s%> <S%H5800>commits<s%> himself to you; you are the <S%H5826>helper<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless.<s%>
<S%H7665>Break<s%> you the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> and the <S%H7451>evil<s%> man: <S%H1875>seek<s%> out his <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> till you <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H1077>none.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H4428>King<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever:<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> are <S%H6>perished<s%> out of his <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H6041>humble:<s%> you will <S%H3559>prepare<s%> their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> you will cause your <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H7181>hear:<s%>

To <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and the <S%H1790>oppressed,<s%> that the <S%H582>man<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H1077>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H6206>oppress.<s%>
